promptContent:
## REGISTRATION (Rule 1020)

**Deadlines:**
- New establishments: Register within **30 days** of operation
- Existing establishments: Register within **60 days** of Standards effectivity

**Key Points:**
- Where: Regional Labor Office
- Form: Rule 1020 Form
- FREE of charge
- No renewal required (one-time registration)
- Online: oshs.dole.gov.ph

**Required Information:**
- Business name and address
- Nature of business
- Number of workers
- Safety officer designation
